name: Siege - Fusion Open Source Game
description:
Free as part of The Reactor: https://www.patreon.com/Clickteam

Siege is a open source game example for Clickteam Fusion 2.5. Developed during the  Sept 22nd, 2017 Reactor Stream ( ) and then polished up a bit. It is freely available to Reactor subscribers or for a modest one time fee on Clickstore. The example includes the following highlights. 

  • Less then 200 lines of events
  • Multiple example use of shaders 
  • Well commented 
  • Scale & Angle functions used through out 
  • Simple Particle effects 
  • And Much More
